DOC.criteria: Aged ＞18 year Patients diabetes mellitus type 2 Diagnosed diabetic retinopathy Clinical Significant Macular Edema Central retinal thickness ( CRT ) 250μm measured optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) ETDRS visual acuity ＞19 letter ( Snellen equivalent 20/400 good ) No macular laser coagulation surgery medicine therapy macular edema within last 6 month Blood glucose control steadily ( HbA1c≤10 % ) Taking part clinical trial within 3 month Planning panretinal photocoagulation ( PRP ) within 3 month Performed cataract surgery last 3 month Accompanied retinal vascular disease lead macular edema , example branch retinal vein occlusion ( BRVO ) , central retinal vein occlusion ( CRVO ) Accompanied severe opacity refractive medium maybe impact therapy observation Accompanied nystagmus Accompanied history maybe interfere result increase risk patient
